properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Paving available stone in the river banks and Planting trees

Dry rubble packing (with locally found rubble, size over 225mm )-Along the river banks

Vegetative cover improving around the water source with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/

properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Construction of Gabion Wall (30 m x 2.5 m)

Site preparation & setting out

Earth excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus materials up to 30m by Manually.

Spreading , Levelling and Compacting Manually Using Standard Cast Iron
